pull.title: Move ParseConfirmTarget from rpc/mining to rpc/util
pull.body:
Util is a better home since it's called both by wallet and mining code.

Suggested https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15288#discussion_r254449444

events.message:
Move ParseConfirmTarget from rpc/mining to rpc/util

Util is a better home since it's called both by wallet and mining code.

Suggested https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15288#discussion_r254449444

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#14978](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/14978.html) (Factor out PSBT utilities from RPCs for use in GUI code; related refactoring. by gwillen)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

Updated c7062070c15e5fec47b740164a8a5b9d8508883b -> 50e647210d513dab8f40ded61fe439ecaa9a67c3 ([pr/movtarget.1](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/movtarget.1) -> [pr/movtarget.2](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/movtarget.2), [compare](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/compare/pr/movtarget.1..pr/movtarget.2)) to fix #include sort order

utACK 50e647210d513dab8f40ded61fe439ecaa9a67c3. Thanks Russ.

The `#include <rpc/mining.h>` can be removed from `rpcwallet.cpp` once `generate()` has been removed post v0.18 (was deprecated in #14468)
